amendment.description: Amendment encourages the CFPB Director to ensure the participation of veteran-owned small business concerns in the Small Business Advisory Board.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 2 printed in part D of House Report 114-74 to encourage the CFPB Director to ensure the participation of veteran-owned small business concerns in the Small Business Advisory Board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kuster amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Kuster.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kuster amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
